EmailTemplate.name: TSE-2018-06-28-RD-Sponsored-Jacksonville.ES-2018-06-21-Jacksonville Invite.Email
EmailTemplate.subject: You're Invited: Jacksonville IT Networking Event
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://www.eventbrite.com/e/jacksonville-it-networking-event-tickets-46888365363]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We’d like to invite you to an afternoon at the American Tactical Training Arms Center for an exclusive outdoor tactical shooting range event on June 28th in Jacksonville, Florida.
Enterprises are facing incredible pressure to modernize and transform their IT to become a digital business, leading many organizations to reimagine their hybrid cloud strategy. Determining which workloads go on-premises, which go into the cloud, and how to manage the transition is challenging – and mistakes are costly.
Jacksonville IT Networking Event <[[http://bit.ly/Jacksonville-vip2]]> American Tactical Training Arms Center <[[http://bit.ly/Jacksonville-vip2]]> Thursday, Jun 28th | 9:00 AM <[[http://bit.ly/Jacksonville-vip2]]>
Throughout the day, you’ll have the chance to share knowledge on tackling these challenges and learn how organizations like yours are adopting workload automation at the scale of the hybrid cloud.
We hope you will join us by registering via the link below: http://bit.ly/Jacksonville-vip2 <[[http://bit.ly/Jacksonville-vip2]]>
Sincerely,
The Turbonomic Team
